categories.body: Episodes of Avatar: The Last Airbender

value.text: Greg Baldwin (Uncle), Andre Sogliuzzo (Hakoda), Richard McGonagle (Bato), Rene Auberjonois (mechanist), Daniel Samonas (Teo), Serena Williams (Ming), Wayne Duvall (Warden Poon), Michael Dow (Haru), Kevin Michael Richardson (Tyro), Carlos Alazraqui (Due/Tho), William H. Bassett (Huu), Mick Foley (The Boulder), Sterling Young (Pipsqueak), Nick Swoboda (The Duke)

links.body: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse

value.text: "The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse"
value.value_text: "The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse"

paragraphs.body: "The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion" is the tenth episode of ${link_0} of ${link_1} and the 50th of the overall series. It debuted on November 30, 2007.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: "The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion" is the tenth episode of Book Three: Fire of Avatar: The Last Airbender and the 50th of the overall series. It debuted on November 30, 2007.

paragraphs.body: On the day of the solar eclipse, the invasion begins. Hakoda returns with a ragtag team of several allies whom the group has met during their adventures. They successfully infiltrate the Fire Nation capital as the invasion force breaks through many security barriers. Upon reaching the Fire Lord's palace, the eclipse begins, but Aang finds no one home.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: On the day of the solar eclipse, the invasion begins. Hakoda returns with a ragtag team of several allies whom the group has met during their adventures. They successfully infiltrate the Fire Nation capital as the invasion force breaks through many security barriers. Upon reaching the Fire Lord's palace, the eclipse begins, but Aang finds no one home.

paragraphs.body: On the morning of ${link_0}, ${link_1} cheerfully greets everyone. ${link_2} notes he seems well rested. Aang confidently believes he can face the ${link_3}. ${link_4} asks Aang if he is going to use the ${link_5} against him, but Aang explains that his seventh ${link_6} was locked when ${link_7} struck him with ${link_8}, so he cannot use it.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: On the morning of the invasion, Aang cheerfully greets everyone. Katara notes he seems well rested. Aang confidently believes he can face the Fire Lord. Toph asks Aang if he is going to use the Avatar State against him, but Aang explains that his seventh chakra was locked when Azula struck him with lightning, so he cannot use it.

paragraphs.body: A fleet of ${link_0} ships appears on the horizon under the cover of a cloak of mist. Together with Toph, Aang creates some makeshift docks in the cove. ${link_1} and Katara greet their father, ${link_2}, and Sokka asks whether he was able to bring the people he requested for the invasion. Hakoda replies he did, but he is unsure about some of them, in particular the ${link_3} ${link_4}, whom ${link_5} wishes would put some pants on. Emerging off one of the boats, ${link_6} declares mystically that pants are an illusion, as is death. ${link_7} believes a rock he sees in the water is some sort of ${link_8} trap.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: A fleet of Southern Water Tribe ships appears on the horizon under the cover of a cloak of mist. Together with Toph, Aang creates some makeshift docks in the cove. Sokka and Katara greet their father, Hakoda, and Sokka asks whether he was able to bring the people he requested for the invasion. Hakoda replies he did, but he is unsure about some of them, in particular the Foggy Swamp Tribe waterbenders, whom Bato wishes would put some pants on. Emerging off one of the boats, Huu declares mystically that pants are an illusion, as is death. Due believes a rock he sees in the water is some sort of Fire Nation trap.

paragraphs.body: Off another ship, ${link_0} greets Katara, sporting a newly grown mustache. She hugs him and ${link_1} thanks her for helping them find their courage when they were imprisoned by the Fire Nation. Toph senses ${link_2} and ${link_3} approaching and prepares to fight them. They instead tell her they are done with the ${link_4} ${link_5} and want to help fight for the ${link_6}.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Off another ship, Haru greets Katara, sporting a newly grown mustache. She hugs him and Tyro thanks her for helping them find their courage when they were imprisoned by the Fire Nation. Toph senses The Hippo and The Boulder approaching and prepares to fight them. They instead tell her they are done with the earthbending tournament and want to help fight for the Earth Kingdom.

paragraphs.body: There is a small explosion on one of the ships, and everyone rushes to see what happened. The ${link_0}, ${link_1}, ${link_2}, and ${link_3} emerge. The mechanist was working on a new type of bomb using peanut sauce, but it proved to be a failure. Pipsqueak and The Duke remark the bombs are destructive and delicious. Teo presents Aang with a gift, a brand new ${link_4} that contains a secret snack compartment.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: There is a small explosion on one of the ships, and everyone rushes to see what happened. The mechanist, Teo, Pipsqueak, and The Duke emerge. The mechanist was working on a new type of bomb using peanut sauce, but it proved to be a failure. Pipsqueak and The Duke remark the bombs are destructive and delicious. Teo presents Aang with a gift, a brand new glider staff that contains a secret snack compartment.

paragraphs.body: At the ${link_0}, Warden ${link_1} continues to taunt the imprisoned ${link_2}. ${link_3}, a young female guard, appears with his breakfast and sneaks in some ${link_4} tea for him. After the other guard leaves, Iroh expresses his gratitude for her kindness.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: At the Fire Nation prison, Warden Poon continues to taunt the imprisoned Iroh. Ming, a young female guard, appears with his breakfast and sneaks in some white jade tea for him. After the other guard leaves, Iroh expresses his gratitude for her kindness.

paragraphs.body: Everyone gathers to hear the invasion plan, Sokka attempts to brief the force about the invasion, but his nervousness gets the best of him; he gets more and more anxious until he loses track of his speech and begins to tell the entire story of how he met Aang. Hakoda takes over for him and confidently rallies the small army. He explains the plan to storm the beach and reach the ${link_0} before the ${link_1}. That way, when the eclipse begins, they can take on the ${link_2} that guard the palace, and Aang can defeat the Fire Lord while he is powerless. After that they will have control over the ${link_3}, and the ${link_4} will be over. Everyone cheers and prepares to depart; ${link_5} wears ${link_6} and Aang shaves his head. Sokka, who is embarrassed of his behavior earlier, is reassured by Aang that he will have a chance to prove himself out on the battlefield. Meanwhile, Zuko begins writing a farewell note to ${link_7} in his bedroom.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Everyone gathers to hear the invasion plan, Sokka attempts to brief the force about the invasion, but his nervousness gets the best of him; he gets more and more anxious until he loses track of his speech and begins to tell the entire story of how he met Aang. Hakoda takes over for him and confidently rallies the small army. He explains the plan to storm the beach and reach the palace before the eclipse. That way, when the eclipse begins, they can take on the firebenders that guard the palace, and Aang can defeat the Fire Lord while he is powerless. After that they will have control over the Fire Nation Capital, and the Hundred Year War will be over. Everyone cheers and prepares to depart; Appa wears armor and Aang shaves his head. Sokka, who is embarrassed of his behavior earlier, is reassured by Aang that he will have a chance to prove himself out on the battlefield. Meanwhile, Zuko begins writing a farewell note to Mai in his bedroom.

paragraphs.body: The invasion force heads to the ${link_0}. Although under the cover of mist, as they approach the gates, an alarm goes off and a large net rises from both sides of the gate, blocking the path. As the net catches fire, groups of firebenders infiltrate the ships and are shocked to discover that they are all empty. The invasion force pass the gate in ${link_1} ships propelled by waterbending. The subs have a limited air supply so they have to resurface before they reach the beach.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: The invasion force heads to the Great Gates of Azulon. Although under the cover of mist, as they approach the gates, an alarm goes off and a large net rises from both sides of the gate, blocking the path. As the net catches fire, groups of firebenders infiltrate the ships and are shocked to discover that they are all empty. The invasion force pass the gate in submarine-like ships propelled by waterbending. The subs have a limited air supply so they have to resurface before they reach the beach.

paragraphs.body: Ming once again visits Iroh with his supper, sneaking in extra rice. Iroh reveals to Ming that her gestures of kindness have made his imprisonment bearable. He also comments that she looks ill and insists that she should go home. When she insists that she is fine, Iroh starkly explains that it would be better if she were not present that afternoon, at which Ming appears to understand.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Ming once again visits Iroh with his supper, sneaking in extra rice. Iroh reveals to Ming that her gestures of kindness have made his imprisonment bearable. He also comments that she looks ill and insists that she should go home. When she insists that she is fine, Iroh starkly explains that it would be better if she were not present that afternoon, at which Ming appears to understand.

paragraphs.body: After resurfacing, the gang gets together one final time to wish each other good luck before parting ways. Aang and Katara say goodbye in private. Katara reveals she is proud of how much Aang has grown since they first met. Aang, realizing how big this day is and that there's a chance that he may not survive, decides that now was the time to make his move. He kisses Katara, confidently snaps out his glider, and flies away to face the Fire Lord, leaving her blushing and looking sadly toward the horizon. Katara subsequently hops on Appa and creates a bubble around his head so that they can breathe underwater; Appa dives into the water as they commence their attack.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: After resurfacing, the gang gets together one final time to wish each other good luck before parting ways. Aang and Katara say goodbye in private. Katara reveals she is proud of how much Aang has grown since they first met. Aang, realizing how big this day is and that there's a chance that he may not survive, decides that now was the time to make his move. He kisses Katara, confidently snaps out his glider, and flies away to face the Fire Lord, leaving her blushing and looking sadly toward the horizon. Katara subsequently hops on Appa and creates a bubble around his head so that they can breathe underwater; Appa dives into the water as they commence their attack.

paragraphs.body: In the meantime, after mentally apologizing to ${link_0} and leaving her the note in her bedroom, ${link_1} is shown sitting in front of a painting of his mother. He confesses his earlier mistakes and promises aloud that he will do what is right and gets ready to leave.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: In the meantime, after mentally apologizing to Mai and leaving her the note in her bedroom, Zuko is shown sitting in front of a painting of his mother. He confesses his earlier mistakes and promises aloud that he will do what is right and gets ready to leave.

paragraphs.body: After the subs evade capture at a gate armed with harpoon gun-type weapons, they finally arrive at the beach near the capital. Storming the ${link_0}, new ${link_1} powered by earthbenders are released from the subs and face off against ${link_2}, as ground fighting ensues, followed by other warriors, benders, and eight ${link_3}. The earthbender tanks are highly resilient and easily defeat the Fire Nation guards.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: After the subs evade capture at a gate armed with harpoon gun-type weapons, they finally arrive at the beach near the capital. Storming the plaza, new caterpillar-like tanks powered by earthbenders are released from the subs and face off against tundra tanks, as ground fighting ensues, followed by other warriors, benders, and eight supply trucks. The earthbender tanks are highly resilient and easily defeat the Fire Nation guards.

paragraphs.body: After noticing a threat from ${link_0} shooting missiles, Katara, Sokka, and Hakoda attack them with Appa. While Katara and Sokka take out one tower, Hakoda destroys another one, but is injured in the process. Katara and Sokka take their father a short distance from the battle. Katara attempts to heal Hakoda, but he is still unable to join the battle anytime soon. Sokka pledges to his father and sister that he will lead the battle in his father's place and flies off on Appa. He lands among the troops, which have been split up in mild disarray. He reorganizes them into wedge formation and orders them to charge up to the palace.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: After noticing a threat from towers shooting missiles, Katara, Sokka, and Hakoda attack them with Appa. While Katara and Sokka take out one tower, Hakoda destroys another one, but is injured in the process. Katara and Sokka take their father a short distance from the battle. Katara attempts to heal Hakoda, but he is still unable to join the battle anytime soon. Sokka pledges to his father and sister that he will lead the battle in his father's place and flies off on Appa. He lands among the troops, which have been split up in mild disarray. He reorganizes them into wedge formation and orders them to charge up to the palace.

paragraphs.body: As the invasion breaches the wall of the capital city, things are looking well. However, when Aang enters the capital city, he finds it completely deserted of people. When he reaches the Fire Lord's throne room in the palace, ${link_0} is nowhere to be found. In anguish, Aang falls to his knees and yells, "Fire Lord Ozai, where are you?"
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: As the invasion breaches the wall of the capital city, things are looking well. However, when Aang enters the capital city, he finds it completely deserted of people. When he reaches the Fire Lord's throne room in the palace, Ozai is nowhere to be found. In anguish, Aang falls to his knees and yells, "Fire Lord Ozai, where are you?"

paragraphs.body: In "${link_0}", Sokka tells Toph that he was planning to make armor for Appa, which he completes for the invasion.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: In "The Runaway", Sokka tells Toph that he was planning to make armor for Appa, which he completes for the invasion.

paragraphs.body: Toph gave Sokka money in "The Runaway" to buy expensive atlases, which are used to explain the invasion plan.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Toph gave Sokka money in "The Runaway" to buy expensive atlases, which are used to explain the invasion plan.

paragraphs.body: Sokka's recollection of Team Avatar's journey recalls the storyline from several episodes featured in ${link_0}.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Sokka's recollection of Team Avatar's journey recalls the storyline from several episodes featured in Book One: Water.

paragraphs.body: This is the third time that Appa took off with another command instead of yip yip, the first and second being in "${link_0}".
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: This is the third time that Appa took off with another command instead of yip yip, the first and second being in "Appa's Lost Days".

paragraphs.body: Aang explains that he can no longer enter the Avatar State due to his seventh and final chakra being blocked, which occurred in "${link_0}" when he was struck by lightning from Azula.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Aang explains that he can no longer enter the Avatar State due to his seventh and final chakra being blocked, which occurred in "The Crossroads of Destiny" when he was struck by lightning from Azula.

paragraphs.body: Hu saying "pants are an illusion, and so is death" is a wordplay on his former line from "${link_0}" when he said that "time is an illusion, and so is death."
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Hu saying "pants are an illusion, and so is death" is a wordplay on his former line from "The Swamp" when he said that "time is an illusion, and so is death."

paragraphs.body: When Toph asks Aang what his plan is to take the Fire Lord down, she mimics a punching attack. However, when she holds up her fists, she has six fingers on her left hand.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: When Toph asks Aang what his plan is to take the Fire Lord down, she mimics a punching attack. However, when she holds up her fists, she has six fingers on her left hand.

paragraphs.body: When Katara worriedly looks at the incoming fog, the part of her hair that is supposed to fill in the space between her left arm and her body is missing.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: When Katara worriedly looks at the incoming fog, the part of her hair that is supposed to fill in the space between her left arm and her body is missing.

paragraphs.body: Ming brings white jade tea to Iroh's cell as an act of kindness, but in "${link_0}", it is established that white jade is poisonous and if ingested fatal without treatment. In that episode, Iroh confuses the white jade bush with ${link_1} and develops rashes for which he must be treated.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Ming brings white jade tea to Iroh's cell as an act of kindness, but in "The Cave of Two Lovers", it is established that white jade is poisonous and if ingested fatal without treatment. In that episode, Iroh confuses the white jade bush with white dragon bush and develops rashes for which he must be treated.

paragraphs.body: When Hakoda is reassuring a nervous Sokka about speaking in front of everyone, Sokka has his sword on his back, but when Sokka is picking up his dropped scrolls after tripping, his sword is missing.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: When Hakoda is reassuring a nervous Sokka about speaking in front of everyone, Sokka has his sword on his back, but when Sokka is picking up his dropped scrolls after tripping, his sword is missing.

paragraphs.body: During Sokka's speech when he says, "Let me start at the beginning," his sword and sheath are on his back. When the camera zooms out, however, they are both gone. However, when Hakoda asks Sokka to take a break, his sword reappears.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: During Sokka's speech when he says, "Let me start at the beginning," his sword and sheath are on his back. When the camera zooms out, however, they are both gone. However, when Hakoda asks Sokka to take a break, his sword reappears.

paragraphs.body: Near the beginning of the episode, when it cuts to Zuko removing his shoulder-plates and Fire Nation hair clip, he pulls open a blank sheet of paper; when the shot closes in on the sheet, it has ink on it.

paragraphs.text: Near the beginning of the episode, when it cuts to Zuko removing his shoulder-plates and Fire Nation hair clip, he pulls open a blank sheet of paper; when the shot closes in on the sheet, it has ink on it.

paragraphs.body: When Zuko removes his ${link_0}, he is wearing a long-sleeved shirt underneath. However, as he sits down to start writing his letter to Mai, his forearms are bare. When the shot changes to a back view, he is once again wearing the long-sleeved outfit.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: When Zuko removes his armor, he is wearing a long-sleeved shirt underneath. However, as he sits down to start writing his letter to Mai, his forearms are bare. When the shot changes to a back view, he is once again wearing the long-sleeved outfit.

paragraphs.body: During the invasion, after Hakoda disarms a Fire Nation soldier, he is holding the two spears with the blades facing in toward his body, but in the next frame the blades are facing out.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: During the invasion, after Hakoda disarms a Fire Nation soldier, he is holding the two spears with the blades facing in toward his body, but in the next frame the blades are facing out.

paragraphs.body: Near the end of the episode, when Sokka is seen mounting Appa to lead the mission after his father is wounded, Appa is missing his reins. In the next scene, Sokka is holding them like he should.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Near the end of the episode, when Sokka is seen mounting Appa to lead the mission after his father is wounded, Appa is missing his reins. In the next scene, Sokka is holding them like he should.

paragraphs.body: Nickelodeon, as it had done for the Fury of Aang ("${link_0}" and "${link_1}") and Secret of the Fire Nation ("${link_2}" and "${link_3}") specials, rallied greatly to promote this two-parter, creating a completely new website with links to a tournament, the Turbonick site, and wallpaper downloads, even including the publishing of a ${link_4} the day before the special's United States premiere.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Nickelodeon, as it had done for the Fury of Aang ("The Library" and "The Desert") and Secret of the Fire Nation ("The Serpent's Pass" and "The Drill") specials, rallied greatly to promote this two-parter, creating a completely new website with links to a tournament, the Turbonick site, and wallpaper downloads, even including the publishing of a new online game the day before the special's United States premiere.

paragraphs.body: Hakoda sports the same symbol on his military uniform as Princess ${link_0} had on her betrothal necklace from Han.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Hakoda sports the same symbol on his military uniform as Princess Yue had on her betrothal necklace from Han.

paragraphs.body: Peanuts are an ingredient in dynamite, giving merit to the ${link_0}'s attempt to make peanut-sauce bombs.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: Peanuts are an ingredient in dynamite, giving merit to the mechanist's attempt to make peanut-sauce bombs.

paragraphs.body: All of the members of Team Avatar and Zuko sport new attire in this episode: Aang wears a combination of his Fire Nation school uniform and his old Air Nomad garb; Katara wears arm and leg guards, no longer keeps her hair braided, and carries three water skins; Sokka sports traditional ${link_0}; Toph wears a variation of the attire worn by earthbending soldiers; and Zuko wears the clothing he typically sports underneath his royal armor.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: All of the members of Team Avatar and Zuko sport new attire in this episode: Aang wears a combination of his Fire Nation school uniform and his old Air Nomad garb; Katara wears arm and leg guards, no longer keeps her hair braided, and carries three water skins; Sokka sports traditional Water Tribe wolf armor; Toph wears a variation of the attire worn by earthbending soldiers; and Zuko wears the clothing he typically sports underneath his royal armor.

paragraphs.body: This is the last episode in the series where Aang is seen with hair, as he ${link_0} it off as everyone prepares for the invasion.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: This is the last episode in the series where Aang is seen with hair, as he shaves it off as everyone prepares for the invasion.

paragraphs.body: The submarines in this episode were revealed by the mechanist to have limited air, which shows comparison to pre-Cold War and World War II submarines.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: The submarines in this episode were revealed by the mechanist to have limited air, which shows comparison to pre-Cold War and World War II submarines.

paragraphs.body: The Day of Black Sun, both parts, is the only episode of the series to show modern day equipment and vehicles like submarines, trucks and missile turrets on the cliffs.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: The Day of Black Sun, both parts, is the only episode of the series to show modern day equipment and vehicles like submarines, trucks and missile turrets on the cliffs.

paragraphs.body: It is also the first time we see female ${link_0} members.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
paragraphs.text: It is also the first time we see female Foggy Swamp Tribe members.

paragraphs.body: When Zuko walks out of his room in the Fire Nation Royal Palace to confront his father, the shot is reminiscent of the last time Zuko saw his mother.
section: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
